subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Bogut, Golden State’s center and a former No. 1 overall pick in the N.B.A. draft, has been a rim-protecting rebounder for a team not always recognized for its stingy defense.
snippet: Bogut, Golden State’s center and a former No. 1 overall pick in the N.B.A. draft, has been a rim-protecting rebounder for a team not always recognized for its stingy defense.
